name: The Army of Zombie H.
description:
Zombie H. wants a world of decay. He has created an army of undead and unleashed it upon the world. Sling your holy weapons and banish them from this world.

This is the first game made during my 1 Game A Week (#1GAW) challenge.

I wanted to do a game where i used the sling mechanic from angry birds. Other aspects I wanted to focus on were:

  • creating assets
  • some simple animations
  • some simple particles

Instructions: Use the mouse pointer to drag and release your weapons towards the enemies.

Credits: All of the game art is made by me. Audio is downloaded from OpenGameArt.

  • Music theme made by pauliuw
  • Sound effects made by artisticdude
